name: Shoot'em UP (sabslabs)
description:
Game Published For ludum-dare 46  game Jam.

for theme: Keep it Alive

In the Post Apocalyptic World your only Hope is Your Cat

your only Source of survival is keeping your pet  Alive and kill all the evil Monster

And the most important thing:

This Cat have only five Lives.

Until all Of them get Eradicated from the Mother Earth.
